description: Detects netsh commands that opens the port 3389 used for RDP, used in Sarwent Malware
name: Netsh RDP Port Opening
query: (process.command_line:*netsh* AND ((process.command_line:*firewall\ add\ portopening* AND process.command_line:*tcp\ 3389*) OR (process.command_line:*advfirewall\ firewall\ add\ rule* AND process.command_line:*action\=allow* AND process.command_line:*protocol\=TCP* AND process.command_line:*localport\=3389*)))
author: Sander Wiebing
